name: Owl Simulator
description:
You are Russian anonymous. Scroll imagesboards, do something in PC, sleep.

The game has a dynamic time of day, as well as ambient temperature, but so far this is a reserve for the future.
In the game you can sleep. To use a computer. Surf the Internet.

Almost every significant holiday will be accompanied by a thematic update, so the game will become more diverse throughout the year.
